Hi Chad! Thanks so much for reaching out. What would you want to use a slider component for?

<@U05KNCMAE7N> We are building a custom CPQ mechanism for our business.  I am currently using a number input component.  But from an experience perspective a slider would be preferred for these numeric fields and the ability to set min, max, and step increment. 

Thank you
<@U01QVR44MEY> of course parameters can be passed to the iframe/modal?
just and FYI, you can set Min and Max on number components, and the iframe would open up in a separate pop up window
oh ok npm update -g @HubSpot/cli resolved my problem
`npm install -g @HubSpot/cli@next` might be what you could go for next time.

Thanks for your patience <@U03BVLC2LDN>. Our tables are vertically aligned to the center so moving the content to the top might not be an option.

I'm curious why you want to start at the top of each cell? Is it a spacing constraint or a visual style you're hoping for? Maybe we can help you with alternatives with more context.

Hi all, Lily here from the HubSpot CRM Product team :wave:

Many of you have been interested in Preview sidebar customization, and I’m happy to share that we’re working on a solution for this.

We’re looking to run a small early access group in the coming weeks. Space is limited, so please join our waitlist via <https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfyaL2SCH2o9EukXZTbEwXKwfAp0SvX6tlA36drDwqHNxVZVA/viewform?usp=sf_link&__hstc=20629287.90be56a88937069ba0115f9e12dcfb36.1701974519915.1705508940098.1705531196528.15&__hssc=20629287.1.1705531196528&__hsfp=2365361157|this form> if you’re interested in getting early access. Note: this feature is only focused on customization of the preview sidebar (add, remove, reorder cards) and does not include extensibility or custom developer cards _yet_.

I look forward to sharing more updates in the coming weeks!

hi all would you be interested in creating a custom activity button that can be triggered from the record or a custom card? if yes, *please* *fill out <https://forms.gle/bcXy6EBxqNdmknnh8|this short form>* so HubSpot’s product team can start collecting use cases :thank-you:
hell yeah, would love if these could bring custom cards into focus
once we get preview extendability the possibilities will be insane

I see, many thanks <@U05KNCMAE7N> for the reply.

To answer your curiosity, it simply does not look good the way it is. The usual expectation is all rows will start at the top, leaving space below. Tables are not usually centered.

To consider the matter deeply, I do not know all the possible use cases right now, the option should simply be there and not hard-coded to ‘center’.
